SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Managers

Class TypeManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Managers.TypeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITypeManager
public class TypeManager extends Object implements ITypeManager
Implementation of the typeManager interface using a typeDAO for the managing of types. Uses dependency injection to get the type DAO.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TypeManager(ITypeDAO typeDAO)
    Constructs a typeManager with an injected type DAO.

    • TypeManager

      public TypeManager(ITypeDAO typeDAO)
      Constructs a typeManager with an injected type DAO.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • addType

      public int addType(Type type)
      Implementation of CRUD method to add a new type. All values for the type model needs to have a value, except for the ID value which is set by the database.
      Specified by:
      addType in interface ITypeManager
      Parameters:
      type - The type to add.
      Returns:
      The ID the type has in the database.

    • updateType

      public void updateType(Type type)
      Updates an existing type in the database, all values for the type are overwritten by this method.
      Specified by:
      updateType in interface ITypeManager
      Parameters:
      type - The type to update, the ID value should be set to the type to update in the database.

    • deleteType

      public void deleteType(Type type)
      Deletes a type from the database, only the ID value for the type to delete needs to be set. If this method is called it should be assumed the type is gone and unrecoverable.
      Specified by:
      deleteType in interface ITypeManager
      Parameters:
      type - The type to delete

    • getAllTypes

      public List<Type> getAllTypes()
      Gets all types that exist in the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllTypes in interface ITypeManager
      Returns:
      A list of all types.

    • getType

      public Type getType(String typeName)
      Finds the type in a database that has the exact same name as the parameter one. If the type doesn't exist it's created.
      Specified by:
      getType in interface ITypeManager
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type to search for.
      Returns:
      The type if found, otherwise null.

    • getTypeByID

      public Type getTypeByID(int typeID)
      Finds the type in a database that has the same ID as the parameter one.
      Specified by:
      getTypeByID in interface ITypeManager
      Parameters:
      typeID - The ID of the type to search for.
      Returns:
      The type if found, otherwise null.
